sources.title: Bell from Hell
sources.description: Title: Bell from Hell Summary: A young man is released from an asylum and returns home for revenge on his aunt and her three daughters, who had him declared insane in order to steal his inheritance. Directed by: Claudio Guerín, Juan Antonio Bardem Actors: Production Company: Hesperia Films S.A. Release Date: 1 October 1973 (Spain) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A young man is released from an asylum and returns home for revenge on his aunt and her three daughters, who had him declared insane in order to steal his inheritance.

metadata.Plot: A young man is released from an asylum and returns home for revenge on his aunt and her three daughters, who had him declared insane in order to steal his inheritance.
metadata.Actors: Renaud Verley, Viveca Lindfors, Alfredo Mayo
